game.name: USFIV: Challengers Vacation Pack 1
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Alternate costume pack for USFIV. Contains new vacation themed outfits for Hakan, Makoto, Guy, Dudley, and Dee Jay.
